css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u{min-width:initial;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,29,48,53),1);padding-top:20px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p.maxi-text-block__content{color:var(--maxi-dark-p-color,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1));font-size:22px;line-height:150%;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:12px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p{color:var(--maxi-dark-link,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,156,246,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p:hover{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p:active{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p:active span{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p:visited{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p:visited span{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u.block-editor-block-list__block a p:visited{color:var(--maxi-dark-link,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,156,246,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u a p:visited:hover{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p a{color:var(--maxi-dark-link,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,156,246,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p a:hover{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p a:active{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p a:active span{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p a:visited{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p a:visited span{color:var(--maxi-dark-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-6,214,163,251),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u.block-editor-block-list__block p ease;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u .maxi-text-block--link span{transition:color 0.3s 0s ease;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u{padding-top:28px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p.maxi-text-block__content{font-size:30px;margin-bottom:22px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-f1ab5a10-u p.maxi-text-block__content{font-size:20px;}}
